short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that allows you to schedule Privid Meetings and stream your desktop into Privid conferences.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension creates a Privid Meeting and then returns a Google calendar entry for you to send out a video event. We want to make video experiences feel just like in-person meetings. That means it's free to hang out. You can invite as many friends and family members as you'd like. There are no limits on how long you can talk. And, we keep all video events secure and private.
